Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: As far as I can tell there is some other factor, you need to entre recv mask consistently the fastest, that means ping time, and a very very fast ram bus speed along with a clean wallet. The two limiting things are, clean wallet (and system speed) then ping time.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: The slowness from having too many utxo and a bloated wallet full of old txs far out weights ping time quite fast.
